revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Billion |model=BiPAC 8200N |revision= |asin=B005C0TH8E |fcc_date=12/26/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=QI3BIL-8200NX |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=VDSL2 DTM Chip;Metanoia;MT2301;;1; ,,, VDSL2 AFE (Analog Front End);Metanoia;MT3301;;1; |flags=VDSL2 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11n VDSL2 4-port Firewall Router}} :[http://www.billion.com/product/vdsl2/BiPAC8200N-wireless-N-VDSL2-firewall-router.html Product page]
The FCC ID applies to the following models.. *BiPAC 8200NX (USB 2.0 ?) *BiPAC 8200N *BiPAC 6201NXL *BiPAC 6201NX
The default SSID is probably '''wlan-ap'''.
*[https://www.tweaktown.com/pressrelease/924/billion_to_intro_next_gen_gpon_routers_at_cebit_09/index.html Press release on '''TweakTown''']
There is a '''Metanoia''' MT2301 chip on-board and likely a '''Ralink''' RT3052 for the WiSoC. {{see also|Planet VC-230N}}
*[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2039534 ''Planet VC-230N VDSL2 Modem/Router'' on '''Whirlpool''' forums] ([http://www.broadbandworldforum.com/wp-content/uploads/175820120528%20Product_brief_collection%203.3.pdf PBrief]) :Metanoia MT2301/MT3301 (Merlin) - VDSL2-only chipset. :Metanoia MT2311/MT3302 - VDSL2/ADSL2+ multi-mode chipset.
==Images== <gallery caption="from Billion"> File:Billion 8200n.jpg|main </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]]
